name: Guy With Glasses
description:
Guy With Glasses is a combination of a platformer and RPG for the best gameplay experience!

Gameplay

  • Face over 100 tricky platforming challenges!
  • 6 unique areas to explore, and 3 villages
  • Fight 3 bosses along the way
  • As you progress, you'll gain new items and abilities

Story

  • Red, and his assistant, Yellow, want to take over the (blocky) world!
  • Follow them throughout 6 areas as you try to stop their evil plan!
  • As you continue, you'll meet lots of characters who are willing (or not willing) to help you on your journey
  • Solve quests, complete interactions, and enjoy the story!

Modes

There are 4 gameplay modes to spice up or ease up your experience.

  1. Normal Mode
    • The optimal mode for the best experience
    • Platforming and bosses are normal
  2. Piece of Cake Mode
    • Ease up the difficulty to focus on story
    • Option to skip stages
    • Bosses are easier
  3. Insane Mode
    • Raise the challenge to a new level!
    • Respawn at various checkpoints rather than the same stage
    • Bosses are much harder
  4. Speedrun Mode
    • Difficulty is equivalent to Normal Mode
    • Music is now "Dream Speedrunning Music"
    • Universal timer to keep track of your speedrun
